key.name: swap-windows-left
key.summary: Swap windows on current monitor with the ones on the monitor to the left

key.name: swap-windows-right
key.summary: Swap windows on current monitor with the ones on the monitor to the right

key.name: swap-windows-up
key.summary: Swap windows on current monitor with the ones on the monitor up

key.name: swap-windows-down
key.summary: Swap windows on current monitor with the ones on the monitor down
